text: Tijuana ( or ; ) is a city in Mexico. It is in the north of the country and across the border from California in the United States. It is the largest city in Baja California. Tijuana is well known destination for US Tourists. Tijuana is the municipal seat for the Tijuana municipality. ==Sources== Category:1889 establishments Category:19th-century establishments in Mexico Category:Municipality seats in Baja California (state)
title: Tijuana
